snippet: We examined Facebook's $1 billion deal for a mobile start-up, Microsoft's $1 billion deal for patents and a $2.15 billion "lawsuit waiting to happen." A look back on our reporting of the past week's highs and lows in finance.
abstract: We examined Facebook's $1 billion deal for a mobile start-up, Microsoft's $1 billion deal for patents and a $2.15 billion "lawsuit waiting to happen." A look back on our reporting of the past week's highs and lows in finance.

headline.main: DealBook's Week in Review: Awash in Cash
